record.field:
${helper.embed_logo_by_name('Motoscoot_footer')|n}
Domiciliación bancaria: Banco Sabadell Atlántico ES76 0081 0135 3000 0110 3918BSABESBBXXX   |  La Caixa ES55 2100 8201 2702 0002 7559CAIXESBBXXX
Page of

<html>
    <head>
        <meta content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" http-equiv="content-type"/>
        <script>
            function subst() {
            var vars={};
            var x=document.location.search.substring(1).split('&');
            for(var i in x) {var z=x[i].split('=',2);vars[z[0]] = unescape(z[1]);}
            var x=['frompage','topage','page','webpage','section','subsection','subsubsection'];
            for(var i in x) {
            var y = document.getElementsByClassName(x[i]);
            for(var j=0; j<y.length; ++j) y[j].textContent = vars[x[i]];
                }
            }
        </script>
        <style type="text/css">
            ${css}
        </style>
    </head>
    <body  onload="subst()">


        ${_debug or ''|n} </body>
</html>
